title: 7 Things You Didn't Know About Plastic Straws - Wilbistraw
body: Yes, here we are providing you with 7 things that you didn't know about plastics. Plastic straws, bags, and coffee cups are not recyclable. Well, you know about reusable plastic straws and all, but these are not worthy. These can take hundreds of years to decompose and degrade naturally. According to RIC, plastic has seven classifications.
